data.name: Prototype Puge
data.notes: "Prototype Puge" can be found upstairs in a building at bedrock hold, the ganglion base in the north west corner of Primordia. As you approach the bases outer walls on foot take a right where the dirt path splits. The building with Prototype Puge is the two floor one just inside the front of the base. Don't forget you can open the doors.
